text: are two Shinto shrines located next to each other in Yamaguchi. Both shrines are dedicated to members of the . == Toyosaka Shrine == Toyosaka Shrine is a Shinto shrine in Yamaguchi, located next to Noda Shrine. It is dedicated to Mōri Motonari. == Noda Shrine == is a Shinto shrine located in Yamaguchi, it is located next to . It is dedicated to Mōri Motonari. == References == Category:Beppyo shrines Category:Bekkaku kanpeisha Category:1873 establishments in Japan Category:Yamaguchi Prefecture
title: Toyosaka and Noda Shrines
